name: ikonami Technologies
description:
We provide on-demand developers to boost the capacity of your internal development teams.
What we bring to the table for you is our ability to provide highly skilled and proven on-demand Drupal, IOS and Android, PHP, WordPress, Zend, Magento, HTML5, Node.js and Sharepoint resources to augment your internal development capacity. Not by outsourcing your projects but in-sourcing our resources to work hand in hand with your internal team as embedded talent.
